backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with CartProvider and SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Responsive footer with brand info, links, social icons, and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper providing consistent header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Modal showing product details with size selection and add‑to‑cart handling.
Grid of clickable product cards displaying images, category, and pricing.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines a Product interface and exports a static array of product objects for the store catalog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, updating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used, exporting nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero banner and content describing the brand’s story and philosophy.
frontend/src/pages/CollectionsPage.tsx: Shows a product grid from the static dataset and a dialog for viewing product details.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation, submission handling, and contact information icons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero banner, featured products grid, and brand values section using navigation and product data.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Defines a cart context provider handling item storage, persistence in sessionStorage, and add/remove/clear cart operations.
frontend/src/state/cart/useCart.ts: Provides a hook to access the cart context and enforce usage within the CartProvider.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains simple validation helpers for email format and required field checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, typography, plugins, and extended design tokens for the project.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about the project including features, requirements, assets, and current project state.
